subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Mussina, who retired after 18 seasons with a 270-153 record and a 3.68 earned run average, should someday be remembered as a Hall of Fame pitcher.
snippet: Mike Mussina, who retired after 18 seasons with a 270-153 record and a 3.68 earned run average, should someday be remembered as a Hall of Fame pitcher.
